sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './CheckoutProduct.css' import {useContext} from 'react' import CommerceContext from './context/commerce-context' function CheckoutProduct({ key, id,title, image, pricing, clickToRemove,qty }) { const {incQty,decQty} = useContext(CommerceContext) return (
{title} $ {pricing * qty}
{qty}
) } export default CheckoutProduct
